existing_features.title: Replace the current Manual Entry tab empty state on the Trade Import page with a functional manual trade entry UI that allows users to input a single trade using the same fields listed in the Upload tab’s “Required columns” hint: client_code, trade_date, exchange, segment, security, side, quantity, price, order_id, trade_id.
Add client-side validation and clear error messaging for the manual trade entry form to prevent incomplete/invalid entries before the user can add/save the trade.
Implement a “prepared for entry” workflow for the Manual Entry tab by letting users add the validated trade to an in-page list (session-only) and manage that list (view rows and remove an entry).

Add a clear, non-blocking UI note in the Manual Entry tab indicating that manual trade entry is currently prepared in the UI and not yet connected to backend persistence (if backend persistence is not implemented as part of this change).

new_feature_requests.summary: In Trade Import, prepare the page to support manual trade entry

projectName: Prepare Trade Import page for manual trade entry
